vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἰωάνα (TR, -ννα; see WH, App., 159), ης, ἡ (Aram יוֺחַן),
Joanna: Luk.8:3 24:10.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Luk.8.3; married to Chuza (G5529)
§ Joanan, "[probably] "Yahweh is gracious"
Joanan, (Proper name), indeclinable, Lk. 3:27*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約亞拿 这个陰性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "耶和華是有恩典的供給者"
苦撒的妻子, 希律王的管家並耶穌的跟隨者 (路 8:3, 24:10| )
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
约亚拿这个阴性专有名词在原文的意思是"耶和华是有恩典的供给者"
苦撒的妻子, 希律王的管家并耶稣的跟随者(路8:3, 24:10 | )
